data.description:
Reservoir will help you keep track of your daily water consumption habits and running statistics over time. We hope to make staying hydrated as effortless and entertaining as possible: say bye-bye to realizing after a workout or class period that you are parched!

Our team hoped to tackle the growing trend of mild dehydration among Americans, by encouraging consistent water intake to reach the daily recommendation of 8 servings. Studies and our personal experience has shown huge impacts of dehydration vs staying hydrated including energy levels, muscle recovery, and brain functions. We hope to extend the benefits of increased water intake to you!

Key features:

Automatic reminder system: pings your watch if you have not drank water in a while!

Streak counter: rewards you for consistently reaching the recommended daily serving!

Ease-of-use: don't worry about a companion app, or bluetooth, or internet connection!

Fun icons and images: just because!

Perfect For Anyone! We encourage everybody to be more aware of their hydration habits. While certain groups like athletes, students, elderly, or those with an illness need to be very conscious of their water intake, everybody can use a hand (or a watch :) ) in being aware of how much they should be drinking.

For those who are interested, you can read about the biology of our thirst drive and its faults here: http://www.nature.com/nature/journal/vaop/ncurrent/full/nature14108.html
data.title: Reservoir

data.description:
CommandWear is a simple-to-use, mobile, scalable and affordable platform that integrates smartphones, wearables, tablets and networks to improve situational awareness for emergency responders who must keep their eyes, ears and hands on the job at all times.

The Pebble Communicator App gives first responders tactile feedback of incoming messages improving communications in noisy conditions or when responders are unable to reach their phones. In conjunction with the Smartphone Communicator App, the Pebble Communicator App provides

• An intuitive and simple interface for receiving and sending messages;
• Simple one-touch acknowledgement of messages to assure communications;

CommandWear is designed to work with a public safety agency’s existing technology (e.g. desktops, laptops, tablets and smart phones). There are three components to the platform.
• The HUB is a highly scalable, secure server for tracking and logging all movement and communication.
• The Commander App runs on tablets or desktops and provides situational awareness in the field or operations center.
• The Communicator App runs on the smartphone of the First Responder.

- Saves the progress when you exit and resumes any save when you launch the app again.
- Keeps track of your best score.

Don't hesitate to make any suggestion or criticism !

(Note : Do not use a long press on the back button to close the app, it will simply kill the app and won't save your progress. Instead, use the long press on the select button, this way your progress is saved and resumed when you start the app again.)

data.description:
Paraplegic Alarm (Paralarm) helps paraplegics to get notified about their next catheterization time and their next pressure relief. It is essential for a paraplegic to catheterize each 6 hours maximum in order to empty the bladder and avoid Urinary Tract Infection (UTI). Also, a paraplegic should make push-ups on his/her wheelchair (or change position if in bed) every two hours maximum in order to avoid pressure sores. This application vibrates when one of these time laps occurs and it keeps track of the last Catheterization (Cath) time and the last Pressure Relief (PR) time; by showing them on the screen of the Pebble Watch.  With just a push of a button, the time of the action (Pressure relief or Catheterisation) is registered on the screen. The ‘UP’ Button is used to register the time when you Catheterise, the ‘MIDDLE’ Button is used to register the time when you change position or make a push up, the ‘DOWN’ Button is used to silence and stops the vibration when it occurs, the ‘BACK’ Button exits the app if necessary.
In the current settings, the time lap for a pressure relief is 2 hours. The time lap for a catheterisation is 5 hours and 30 minutes. On each time lap the user is notified via a vibration of the watch that lasts around 30 seconds.

latest_release.release_notes: In this version, Paralarm application can run in the background!

data.description:
Draw just by tilting your wrist!

Note: Currently not compatible with Pebble Times. Working on fixing this and adding color.

Send the drawing to your phone without sending anything to a server or needing a companion phone app.

View the drawing on your phone by going to the 'Draw' app settings in the Pebble phone app. (Only tested with iPhone)

iPhone users - To save, copy, send the image:
1) Hold down on the image in the 'Draw' settings in the Pebble phone app and tap Copy
2) Create a new note in the Notes app and paste into the note
3) Tap Done and then hold down on the pasted image, which will let you save, send, copy the image from there.

- 1st Shake of Pebble: While not drawing, undo last pen stroke 
- 2nd Shake of Pebble: While not drawing, undo the undo or clear the image based on setting
- Up Button: Re-center cursor
- Select Button: Click to toggle 'pen' on/off, Hold for 2 seconds for Eraser
- Down Button: Actions & Settings, including send image to phone

data.description:
Driver Timer keeps track of your HGV driving hours for UK truck/lorry drivers. It should also be compatible with other countries that adhere to the EU Driving Laws.

As of version 1.1, the application now supports EU domestic rules too for van drivers etc. This option can be enabled in the settings page.

This app is very basic and only keeps track of driving hours on a daily basis. It has vibration alerts for when you are getting close to approaching your driving rest periods.

I made this app as part of my dissertation project for my university degree and I would appreciate any and all feedback. It is based on the original code from https://github.com/Katharine/pebble-stopwatch

latest_release.release_notes: Fixed a bug that would prevent rest timer alerts.

data.description:
Accelerometer-based calculator with RPN (reverse Polish notation). Move the cursor by tilting your hand.

IMPORTANT: Because it uses RPN, to calculate 1+1 you need to first input "1", confirm, input an another "1" and then press "+". The same with the other operations.

Buttons:
- Lower :: click
- Middle :: push number to the stack (accept/confirm number)
- Middle hold :: empty the stack
- Upper :: backspace / pop a number from the stack
- Upper hold :: clear the current number

Fractions are supported up to two decimal places.

data.description:
Quickly get directions to an upcoming location along your route without having to turn around. Just select what you're looking for and and let myPath - Locations Along Route find it for you.

Hate when your navigation system has you turn around or go off your route to get to a stop along your trip? Never again will you needlessly waste time doubling back when trying to make a quick stop on a trip. The myPath app utilizes location technology to detect your route direction, and shows you matching locations ahead along your route based off your search keywords.

For example, say you're traveling north on I-95. myPath will only show you locations north of you along the route you're traveling, ensuring all results won't have you turning around and wasting time to reach them. And once you've found what you're looking for, simply tap on the location search result to get address information.

myPath lets you save time and hassle on your car trip. Only deal with locations along your route ahead of you with myPath.

Full Android application:
http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=myPathLite.app&hl=en

Donations to PayPal email: zach.butler0928@gmail.com

data.description:
+++ Now supports German +++ 

English:

Measure your daily caffeine consumption and calculate how much caffeine is in your blood.

How-to:
Increase/decrease caffeine intake with the up and down buttons. 
Press long to increase/decrease by 100.
Long press select to reset.
The caffeine amount is calculated automatically.

FAQ
Q: Do I have to keep the app open all the time?
A: No, your caffeine count is saved in your Pebble's storage.

Q: Does it work 100% correct?
A: No, it's impossible to calculate it 100% correct, but this Watchapp is there to give you an idea of how much's in your blood. Don't use it for medical purposes.

Q: Will this app help me to reduce my caffeine intake
A: It should, but it can't.

Deutsch:

Überwache deinen alltäglichen Koffeinkonsum und berechne die in deinem Blut befindliche Dosis.

How-to:
Mit Hoch/Runter die eingenommene Menge Koffein erhöhen bzw. verringern.
Länger gedrückt halten um gleich um 100mg zu erhöhen/verringern.
Select lange gedrückt halten zum Zurücksetzen.
Die Koffeinmenge wird automatisch berechnet.

FAQ
Q: Muss ich die App geöffnet lassen?
A: Nein, die Koffeinmenge und Zeit wird in deiner Uhr gespeichert und beim erneuten Öffnen der App aktualisiert.

Q: Funktioniert es 100% genau
A: Nein, das ist unmöglich zu berechnen. Die App soll nur einen Eindruck vermitteln, wieviel Koffein sich ungefähr in deinem Körper befindet.

Q: Hilft diese App dabei, den Koffeinkonsum zu verringern?
A: Sollte sie, kann sie aber nicht.

data.author: Braci Ltd.
data.description:
Braci – ‘On The Go’ is a unique application that is used by people who are continuously on the go and out & about cycling, driving or just having a walk while listening to music through their headphones. The application detects and alerts users to sounds happening in their environments, including car horns, sirens (police, ambulance, and fire engines) train whistles and traffic tones. 
The sound is detected through the microphone of the user’s smartphone, once the sound is detected, any type of music playing will automatically pause and the user will be notified through a series of vibrations and on screen event, occurring on both a smartphone and smartwatch. All of this process occurs within 1-2 seconds, making the application have a very fast responsive time.
Features:

1- Highly sensitive and accurate 
2- Smart Notification – Stopping music to allow the user to pay attention
3- Internationally Universal – comes pre-installed with car horn sounds
4- Noise Cancellation – Cancelling out all other outdoor background sounds
data.title: Braci - On The Go

changelog.release_notes: Issues where Weather text greater than 995 characters caused the app to crash has now been resolved by capping the display to 995 characters. This is a new release due to Kimono API Scraper being decommissioned. API created instead on Import.io for scraping the Met Eireann Website. Thanks for using the App.
New release due to Kimono API Scraper being decommissioned. API created instead on Import.io for scraping the Met Eireann Website. Thanks for using the App.
New Release using Import.io Service due to shutdown of Kimono API Service
Included Ulster Weather

First Release of a very simple app to pull weather data from met.ie, the Irish weather website. It's my first attempt at an app so please email me at denisfinnegan@gmail.com with any issues. This app pulls Today, Tomorrow, 3 day Outlook and regional weather forecasts. I would like to acknowledge that this data comes from the Met.ie website but as the website currently has no RSS feed nor app for the pebble available, I hope they will acknowledge the public service I have done them by making their data available to Pebble users.

data.description: Simple Irish Weather App that shows you Today, Tomorrow & the 3 Day Outlook for Ireland; as well as regional weather. Data is pulled directly from the MET Eireann website and updated hourly. It's purely text based and pretty simple but gives far more detail than any of the other weather apps or watchfaces.

latest_release.release_notes: Issues where Weather text greater than 995 characters caused the app to crash has now been resolved by capping the display to 995 characters. This is a new release due to Kimono API Scraper being decommissioned. API created instead on Import.io for scraping the Met Eireann Website. Thanks for using the App.

data.title: Irish Weather

data.author: Richard Boyd

changelog.release_notes:
Small bug fixes. 

It's sad to have to remove functionality from the app; however, this release removes access to political information. Despite me not making a penny from this app, and despite MySociety's API documentation stating that the API could be used free of charge for non-commerical applications, I received a rather terse e-mail from a representative of MySociety demanding payment. I have confirmed the non-commerical status of this app; however, given MySociety's unprofessional approach to the matter, I have chosen to remove their data from the app. 

If you choose to continue running an older version of the app, I can't guarantee that the political information will continue to work.

Bug fixes:

* Better support for situations where the connected smartphone has limited internet access

New in this Release:

* New 'About Area' section, displays summaries of Wikipedia articles related to the local area
* New categories available in the 'Nearby' section: Food and Bars & Pubs

New in this Release:

* UI improvements

New in this Release:

* More detailed property value information, including most and least expensive property sales
* More detailed information now available in the 'Nearby' section, including full address details, phone numbers and opening hours (where available)

New in this Release:

* More detailed weather information, including wind speed and direction
* New 'Crime' section detailing all crimes reported in the local area over the past 12 months
* More detailed information now available in the 'Nearby' section. Press select when viewing an entry to view the address, if available.

New in this Release:

* Local Information is now categorised for easier navigation
* More detailed weather information, including tomorrow's forecast
* New 'Nearby' section, which shows nearest train stations, cash machines, fuel stations, supermarkets and pharmacies
Our first release! If you encounter any issues, please e-mail us at boyd@darena.net.

data.description:
UK Local Info provides you with immediate access to information relevant to where you are right now in the UK, including facts about the local area, your location information (postcode, grid reference and more), weather information (current conditions, temperature, tomorrow's forecast and sunrise/sunset),  property value information, crime statistics and details of nearby train stations, cash machines, fuel stations, supermarkets, pharmacies, bars, pubs & restaurants/take-aways.

Note: You can use this app outside of the UK, but the amount of data available will be limited.

Tip: long press the select button on any menu screen to reload the data (useful if you're moving around).

changelog.release_notes:
iScribes Pebble Watch App - RELEASE v1.24

The Priority button is back! As a reminder, pressing that button for a recording will place it at the top of your scribe’s list for processing, but this does not guarantee 4 hour completion. If you would like 4 hour STAT handling for a patient, the process for that is to email stat@iscribes.co with the following information: doctor name, patient initials, appointment date and time, and the reason for the STAT request.

Reduced connectivity problems with the Pebble Watch App

Sign into iScribes and the Pebble Watch App buttons do not work

Pebble watch app closing after first recording is stopped

Unable to communicate between the Pebble Watch App with the iScribes iOS App after devices have been out of range of each other.

Better responsiveness of the iScribes Pebble Watch App buttons when clicked.

Add a new Connected / Disconnected indicator in the upper left which shows Bluetooth status for your Pebble

A new Pebble battery percentage indicator in the upper right lets you see when the device is running low on energy.

If your Pebble loses Bluetooth connectivity with your iOS Device, we now show the following error screen, and the watch will give you one long buzz to let you know that the watch has lost its Bluetooth Connection with your iOS device

Better Bluetooth Support
Better IOS 10.x Bluetooth Communication
Updated to latest Pebble Build Software

Better notification about iScribes iOS errors on watch,
New time display

data.description: iScribes app for Pebble is a companion app for iScribes application for mobile devices with iOS and Android. iScribes mobile application provides our customers with secure recording capabilities from a compatible mobile device. The features of this app are only accessible with a paid subscription to iScribes services.

data.description:
A sleep tracker which runs only on your Pebble. No companion app required.

Tracks your movement over a 10 hour period and displays a graph and some statistics.

Set an alarm that will vibrate when it detects movement up to 30 minutes prior to the alarm time to wake you up not during REM sleep.

[HOW TO USE]
Hold up to reset the data to blank.
Press up after reset to start tracking
Press up again to stop tracking
Hold down to set alarm

data.description:
Allows tracking of match time, including stoppages, cards and score. For spectators, coaches and reporters - maybe even for referees!

Press select to toggle between match start/stop mode - press up to start and stop the timer (a long press resets the match time here), cards mode - pressing up adds a new card timer, and score mode - Up adds a score for the home team, Down adds for the away team. Long presses subtracts one in case of a mistake.

Now, you can set the match time and card time. Enter the setup mode with a long press on the Down button while in match start/stop mode. Use up and down to add and reduce match time. Select to move on.

latest_release.release_notes: V1.11 fixes problem where background makes text invisible on Pebble Time. This release functional on all Pebble models.
